body_html:
@traveller59 thank you for the report! Should be fixed now.

We ended up adding a shape cache for the scratch space in the kernel itself (so the same kernel will be re-used every call, but it will allocate space for whichever shapes it sees).

body:
@traveller59 thank you for the report! Should be fixed now.

We ended up adding a shape cache for the scratch space in the kernel itself (so the same kernel will be re-used every call, but it will allocate space for whichever shapes it sees).
